snippet: New books by Ben Emons and JoAnneh Nagler offer down-to-earth financial recommendations: spend less than you earn and invest conservatively in times of uncertainty.
abstract: Paul B Brown Off the Shelf column reviews books The Debt-Free Spending Plan by JoAnneh Nagler and The Financial Domino Effect by Ben Emons.
lead_paragraph: New books by Ben Emons and JoAnneh Nagler offer down-to-earth financial recommendations: spend less than you earn and invest conservatively in times of uncertainty.

headline.seo: New Books Look at Basic Budgeting and Investing - Review
headline.main: For Uncertain Times, Some Back-to-Basics Advice
headline.print_headline: For Uncertain Times, Some Back-to-Basics Advice
